choices: Very pregnant secretary.  You are a boy
Very pregnant secretary.  You are a Girl
Very big breasted secretary.  You are a boy
Very big breasted secretary.  You are a girl
Normal secretary.  Only you are altered.
1.content: The first day of school in this newly build education building. There was a scandal of the location of this school. it was a warehouse that shouldn't exist full of TV remotes. Then after a sinkhole collapse the warehouse, it took the crew a month to fill it up. You walking into the school and resister at the front office with the secretary. There you notice a small flash and there was a...
1.title: First day of school.

info.brief_description: As your first day of school in a quiet small city.  This school isn't quite normal.
info.description: This story is a squeal of Remote of Alteration. Instead of a remote, the whole school is changing you.
